title: Scouting in Australia
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, Joe Scully, Australian Boy Scouts Association and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Illustrates the impact upon a boy of his joining the Scouts, the involvement of his father in the Movement, the Scouts’ work in the community and the international status of the Scouting Movement. Includes scenes of a Scout Rally, an investiture, a Group Committee and the ‘Jamboree of the New Endeavour’ at Leppington, N.S.W
